tha-ap119:2.1: Otataṃ vitthataṃ → ogataṃ vitataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); otataṃ vitataṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap119:2.2: suvicittavaṭaṃsakaṃ → suci cittaṃ papañcakaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed); suvicittaṃ vaṭaṃsakaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap119:4.3: Pāṇabhūte → pāṇabhūnaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); pāṇabhūtaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap119:6.4: caritaṃ → karitaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed); kāritaṃ (si, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
